exhibitions.title: Studebaker Legacy Exhibit
exhibitions.description: A collection of Studebaker cars and memorabilia from the 1930s to the 1960s, showcasing the legacy of Studebaker Corporation.
exhibitions.location: Texas Museum of Automotive History, Austin, TX

exhibitions.title: Studebaker Car Show
exhibitions.description: An annual gathering of Studebaker car enthusiasts, featuring a display of classic and modern Studebaker cars.

exhibitions.title: Studebaker Club Meeting
exhibitions.description: A monthly meeting of the Studebaker Drivers Club, where members discuss their Studebaker cars and share restoration tips.
